dc_title_s: Public Schools Safe Passages: Chicago, Illinois, 2014-2015
dc_description_s: The safe passages program has been implemented to increase childrenâ€™s safety as they come and go each day. The data can be viewed on the Chicago Data Portal with a web browser. However, to view or use the files outside of a web browser, you will need to use compression software and special GIS software, such as ESRI ArcGIS (shapefile) or Google Earth (KML or KMZ), is required.
